item.description:
Hey all nix the Boloco - we are going to meet up at GOURMET DUMPLING HOUSE at 8pm. If not, see you at the concert!  I'll e-mail attendees.  Thanks.

Indie rock emergency: The band with best singer of our generation (Beth Ditto) is coming to town the day before my birthday and I have no one to go with! We need to fix this asap! If you like indie rock with Riot Grrrl and DIY punk roots you'll love the Gossip!

I'm still getting used to their new album, but check out, "That's Not What I Heard," for the Gossip at their best.

Let's meet up at 7pm...I'm thinking Boloco might be the easiest and quickest.  It's at 2 Park Plz # 1 Boston, MA 02116.
item.how_to_find_us: GOURMET DUMPLING HOUSE 8pm, or at Concert, just text me.
item.name: The Gossip
